about_the_game:
This Demo is a limited version of the full game to stop waiting and jump into running your Shooting Range already. Don't forget to wishlist the full game to continue your most fun Shooting Range experience.

On running your own Shooting Range Shop Adventure you will

Host customers every day and try to fulfill their orders, expand and upgrade your shop for even host large numbers of customers. You can buy better guns and gun parts as your popularity level goes up, customers will always wants more! You need to manage your resources to grow every day and remain in these hard business environments. Modify your weapons as you like and see what customers will do with them. If they do suspicious acts just use your good old stun gun.

When the time comes you can take your business outside of your shop and create military companies, explore new areas that you can do exciting things like joining shooting competitions and more. You can choose your own way in this world and no one can stop you because you will have lots and lots of guns.

This Demo is a limited version of the full game to stop waiting and jump into running your Shooting Range already. Don't forget to wishlist the full game to continue your most fun Shooting Range experience.

Host customers every day and try to fulfill their orders, expand and upgrade your shop for even host large numbers of customers. You can buy better guns and gun parts as your popularity level goes up, customers will always wants more! You need to manage your resources to grow every day and remain in these hard business environments. Modify your weapons as you like and see what customers will do with them. If they do suspicious acts just use your good old stun gun.

When the time comes you can take your business outside of your shop and create military companies, explore new areas that you can do exciting things like joining shooting competitions and more. You can choose your own way in this world and no one can stop you because you will have lots and lots of guns.
name: Shooting Range Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 2GB
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-9400F
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 4GB
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Start running your own Shooting Range with Demo already. Manage your supplies, rent guns and sell ammos which suits guns calibre. Expand and upgrade your shop, level up your popularity to get even better equipment. Maybe you want to use your guns in your own range.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
